EmailTemplate.name: Turbofest Atlanta 2015.Registered Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed Registration: Turbofest Atlanta
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{Lead.First Name:default=}} Thank you for registering to attend Turbofest Atlanta 2015! We'll send you further details and information as we near the event.
{{Lead.First Name:default=}} {{Lead.Last Name:default=}} {{company.Company Name:default=}} Turbofest Atlanta More details to come! We cannot wait to see you at this exciting event. If you have any questions, please contact marketing@vmturbo.com <mailto:marketing@vmturbo.com>. Team Turbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
